title: Gold 3 ADC help?
body:
Now, I know that a lot of people won't read this- mostly because they're probably too high elo to want to waste their time.. But I'd really like some help to better improve my mechanics, and skill on League of Legends. I'm a VERY determined individual, and I am ALWAYS open to feedback.

I really enjoy playing Vayne & Sivir, they're usually my go-to ADCs bot lane.

I'm interested in learning more about Ezreal & Jinx, as well though.

If there's anyone out there willing to just help teach me even basic things I may not know, it would REALLY help.

I'm not looking for any sarcastic remarks commented either, as this is a serious post and I am craving to get better at this game.
